Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Grounds_for_Claim: Unreasonable delay in processing citizenship application
Legal_Framework: Federal Court review of administrative action
Evidence_Requirement: Demonstration of undue or unreasonable delay
Decision_Outcome: No breach of duty found by the Minister
Institutional_Action: Delay due to ongoing CSIS security check
Government_Body_or_Authority: Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship; CSIS
Evidence_Type: Duration and complexity of security assessment
Temporal_Context: Delay of less than one year
Complaint_Issues: Alleged failure to process application with reasonable diligence
Legal_Standard: Duty of reasonable diligence in administrative processing
State_Protection_Assessment: State action deemed lawful and within bounds
Legal_Provision: Citizenship Act provisions on ministerial duties and security checks
State_Protection_Adequacy: Deemed adequate given national security context
Perpetrator_Entity: Minister (as representative of federal immigration authorities)
Legal_Basis: Statutory discretion under the Citizenship Act
